CustomField.defaultValue: "Applicants must be current residents with a minimum of 2 years training in neurology or have obtained their board certificate/completed training within the last 3 years at the time of application; be fluent in English or the local language (host department)." + BR() + BR() + "Awardees from previous years are no more qualified." + BR() + BR() + "All applicants must be Full member or RRFS member and work in an EAN (corresponding) member country at time of application."
CustomField.label: Eligibility
